ygData.subject: Re: Stun issue - actually about clothing...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah I wish we could wear clothing other than newbie(naked) or stuff that looks just like it. I love just wandering around newbie areas preforming random
ygData.messageBody:
>But wait. We're clerics. Shouldn't we be able to wear vestments on special
>occasions? Now that would be cool.

Yeah I wish we could wear clothing other than newbie(naked) or stuff that
looks just like it.

I love just wandering around newbie areas preforming random acts of
goodness, and I rarely feel like the humble priest wandering amoung the
people dressed in full banded with my hammer et cetera...

I would love to be able to just wear a white robe with armour underneath
it...
or a tabard....wouldn't that be cool, with the symbol of your god on it??

Imagine a party of Clerics and Paladins dressed in blinding white robes and
tabards, wading into a pile of undead.... (yeah yeah, white don't last too
long in combat....but still!)

Calaen,
Humble Priest of Erollisi Marr
19th Circle
Prexus
